subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: With Big Brown, the nation’s best 3-year-old, taking a pass on the Travers Stakes, 12 names passed through the entry box, potentially creating a large Travers field.
snippet: With Big Brown, the nation’s best 3-year-old, taking a pass on the Travers Stakes, 12 names passed through the entry box, potentially creating a large Travers field.
